name: Herbalist
description: A locale steeped in arcane or spiritual power; adventurers may study spells, brew potions, or face eldritch hazards.
atmosphere: The shop is filled with the rich scent of herbs and the subtle tang of natural magic. The air carries the promise of healing and the mysteries of botanical knowledge, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of natural remedies and the ancient wisdom of plant lore.
